annotations.normalized_text: God Save the Queen / White Cliffs of Dover

text: @BBCNews Coronavirus shall tremble in fear as the armies of the four nations stand shoulder-to-shoulder, bayonets in hand, whilst the Union Jack standard bearer trumpets a God Save the Queen / White Cliffs of Dover mash-up. 🇬🇧
